content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am cyber-harrassed by someone I don't know.
Can you tell me more about it? I know you are not anonymous, but perhaps you can share with me a bit more about why you were victimized.
They grab a photo of mine and threaten to spread to online.
I can imagine how shocking that would be to do that, how frightening that would seem to you. Would it be possible to make sure that you did not spread this out?
